name: Cyber Box
description:
You need to avoid the obstacles on the level and collect the items at the same time, you can move through walls 

and turn either way, you need collect all items as you can for move forward speed and levels.

Features:

- Flip, spin and dodge your way through more than 50 deviously designed patterns.

- 2 Gamemodes.

- several color schemes.

- So addictive.

- Share your best scores.

- PC Graphics.
